    • Peer

  • public class Peer
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean chokedByMe
      Keep track of whether this peer is choked or unchoked from the point of view of the current client.

      Keep track of whether this peer has choked or unchoked the current client, per the https://wiki.theory.org/BitTorrentSpecification
      boolean currentlyRequesting
      Keep track of whether I'm currently making a request to this peer.

    • Field Detail

      • user

        public User user
        Basic connectivity information, and username

      • messages

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer>> messages
        Set of messages this peer has. Maps message creator ID -> (set of sequence numbers)

      • chokedMe

        public boolean chokedMe
        Keep track of whether this peer has choked or unchoked the current client, per the https://wiki.theory.org/BitTorrentSpecification

      • chokedByMe

        public boolean chokedByMe
        Keep track of whether this peer is choked or unchoked from the point of view of the current client.

      • currentlyRequesting

        public boolean currentlyRequesting
        Keep track of whether I'm currently making a request to this peer. Never make more than one request at the same time to the same peer, because they will probably be refused.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Peer

        public Peer(User user)

    • Method Detail

      • interestedIn

        public boolean interestedIn(Message message)
        Parameters:
        message - Message which could possibly request.
        Returns:
        Boolean of whether this peer is interested (doesn't have it already).

      • sendControlData

        public void sendControlData(byte[] data)
        Sends a control packet over UDP.
        Parameters:
        data - The control packet to send

      • has

        public boolean has(Message message)
        Have received notification that Peer has a new packet that I can request.
        Parameters:
        message - The message in question that the peer now has.
        Returns:
        boolean: false if Peer already knew about packet, true if this is new information

      • giveBusinessCard

        public void giveBusinessCard(User user)
        Send my contact information to this peer.
        Parameters:
        user - The contact information to send.
